languages.text: "Теперь все ясно. Здесь была битва, и, готовясь к ней, наставник Амарнат запретил посторонним вход в обсерваториум. Даже другим слугам Омниссии, Эксплораторам. Это был внутренний конфликт, и он ждал, что врагами его станут вчерашние техносоратники".

"Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
languages.original_text: "Теперь все ясно. Здесь была битва, и, готовясь к ней, наставник Амарнат запретил посторонним вход в обсерваториум. Даже другим слугам Омниссии, Эксплораторам. Это был внутренний конфликт, и он ждал, что врагами его станут вчерашние техносоратники".

traits.locale_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat had declared the observatorium off limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he had expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「ようやくすべてが明らかになりました。ここで戦闘が行われ、その準備の間にアマルナトは観測所を立入禁止にしたのです。万機神の共働者たるエクスプロレイターさえも入れぬよう。内紛でした、アマルナトはかつての技術同胞が敵になると予期していました」
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「ようやくすべてが明らかになりました。ここで戦闘が行われ、その準備の間にアマルナトは観測所を立入禁止にしたのです。万機神の共働者たるエクスプロレイターさえも入れぬよう。内紛でした、アマルナトはかつての技術同胞が敵になると予期していました」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “如今一切都一目了然，这里曾发生过一场战斗。在准备战斗的过程中，阿玛纳特宣布关闭瞭望台。即使是欧姆尼塞亚的其他仆人，那些开拓者也不得入内。这是一场内部冲突，他早已预料到，昔日的技术伙伴会成为他的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: “如今一切都一目了然，这里曾发生过一场战斗。在准备战斗的过程中，阿玛纳特宣布关闭瞭望台。即使是欧姆尼塞亚的其他仆人，那些开拓者也不得入内。这是一场内部冲突，他早已预料到，昔日的技术伙伴会成为他的敌人。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Tout est clair, maintenant. Une bataille a eu lieu, et, pendant les préparatifs, Amarnat a interdit l'accès à l'observatorium. Même aux autres serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, les Explorators. Il s'agissait d'un conflit interne, il devait donc s'attendre à ce que ses technoconfrères d'autrefois deviennent ses ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: « Tout est clair, maintenant. Une bataille a eu lieu, et, pendant les préparatifs, Amarnat a interdit l'accès à l'observatorium. Même aux autres serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, les Explorateurs. Il s'agissait d'un conflit interne, il devait donc s'attendre à ce que ses technoconfrères d'autrefois deviennent ses ennemis. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Ahora todo está claro. Aquí ha habido un combate, y mientras se preparaban, Amarnat prohibió la entrada al observatorium. Incluso a sus compañeros, los sirvientes del Omnissiah, los Exploradores. Fue un conflicto interno y esperaba que sus tecnocamaradas se convirtieran en sus enemigos».
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora todo está claro. Aquí ha habido un combate, y mientras se preparaban, Amarnat prohibió la entrada al observatorium. Incluso a sus compañeros, los sirvientes del Omnissiah, los Exploradores. Fue un conflicto interno y esperaba que sus tecnocamaradas se convirtieran en sus enemigos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Nun ist alles klar. Hier wurde ein Kampf ausgetragen, und während der Vorbereitungen darauf hat Amarnat das Observatorium zum Sperrgebiet erklärt. Selbst für andere Diener des Omnissiah, die Exploratoren. Es war ein interner Konflikt, und er hatte erwartet, dass seine einstigen Techkameraden zu seinen Feinden werden."
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Nun ist alles klar. Hier wurde ein Kampf ausgetragen, und während der Vorbereitungen darauf hat Amarnat das Observatorium zum Sperrgebiet erklärt. Selbst für andere Diener des Omnissiah, die Exploratoren. Es war ein interner Konflikt, und er hatte erwartet, dass seine einstigen Techkameraden zu seinen Feinden werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Şimdi her şey netleşti. Burada bir muharebe yaşanmış. Ona hazırlık yapılırken Amarnat, gözlemhaneye girişin yasak olduğunu ilan etmiş. Diğer Hermesih hizmetkârları olan Keşiftörlere bile yasaklamış. İç çatışma yaşanmış, eski tekno yoldaşlarının düşmanı olmasını beklemiş."
languages.original_text: "Now everything is clear. A battle was fought here, and during preparations for it, Amarnat declared the observatorium off-limits. Even to fellow servants of the Omnissiah, the Explorators. It was an internal conflict, and he expected his erstwhile tech-comrades to become his enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi her şey netleşti. Burada bir muharebe olmuş ve ona hazırlık yapılırken Amarnat, gözlemhaneye girişin yasak olduğunu ilan etmiş. Diğer Hermesih hizmetkârlarına, Keşiftörlere bile. Bir iç çatışma yaşanmış ve eski tekno yoldaşlarının düşmanı olmasını beklemiş."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
